title: LoL Drinking game!
body:
me and a friend had a couple drinks the other day while he was over and decided to try make a few drinking games based off league. turned out pretty fun!

here are the rules. we did it as a 1v1 on summoners rift but i dont see why you couldnt do this with even as far up as 5 man teams.

-optional: flip a coin, winner gets to nominate a lane eg mid, bot, top/jg. you then pick champs that would normally be played in that role at least semi regularly. alternatively you can pick roles eg bruiser, mage, assassin, etc.

-pick starting items as usual and meet in mid lane. ignore other lanes, agree on if you can take jungle camps or not.
-you cannot purchase items with the exclusion of tier 1 boots until you die.
-when you die you may only buy 1 component per death, you may purchase 1 extra component on death if you take a 5 drink penalty. (you must build in order, so example to build a stinger id die, get 1 dagger, drink 5 penalty drinks to get the 2nd dagger, then on my next death i can finish it into a stinger)
-drink 1 drink per death. and an additional drink for a death spree. eg ive just died my 5th time in a row, so i drink 5 drinks for that death
-if you get shutdown drink the number your spree was upto. 6 killing spree so i drink 6 drinks for example
-drink 3 if you lose a tower (in mid) and also purchase 1 additional component next death or back.
-drink 5 if you B (but remember dont buy unless you die) alternatively walk back to base and only drink 3.
-drink 5 if you fall 50, 100, 150, etc cs behind your opponent.
-finish your drink if your mid inhib falls
-game ends after inhib is destroyed.

it looks complex but its actually pretty easy to remember once you play a few times we had a blast (and ended up drinking alot lol) hope you guys have fun!

Extra rules if you guys play more than 1v1
-if an ally dies drink 1,
-if your team gets aced drink an additional 1 ontop of each drink per ally death
-(if its teams and you want to add in drag/baron) if you get dragon/herald enemy team drinks 3, for baron enemy team drinks 6

plz drink responsibly;P and remember, never drink and ranked!

Clarity: just incase anyones not sure when i say something like "drink 5" i mean 5 swigs/sips of your drink not the entire cup or shots haha
